title: Civilization 3 Complete Edition
description:
i. Use 7-zip to decompress.

1. Mount the first iso file in a disc emulator like Daemon Tools.
2. Install the game. Mount the other iso files when prompted.
3. Apply the civ3v129f patch.
4. Replace Civ3Conquests.exe in the \Conquests directory.
5. Run it.

Please be aware that only the Conquests version of the game fully works. This is really the best and only version of the game though!
